reviewText: This is my favorite group of all times. Would love to find more of their dvd concerts. This dvd is awesome and worth it.

I bought this item as a present for my husband and he just recently open it.  While we were watching after the opening credit a series of B&W pictures were showing but there was no sound. I thought it was the way the opening worked until I saw on the back of the cover that a poem was taking place while the B&W pictures were shown. Would it possible to replace this item for one that has audio on its entirety. what should I do?
I appreciate your feedback,
Brenda L. Bernier
This Cd is very good the quality of the sound  is perfect, I can't wait for the second DVD
